title: Nasus When the Enemy Laner Agrees Just to Farm All Game

replies.body: Then you try to teamfight and get kited to death even though you have 1200 stacks.
{{champion:89}} {{champion:67}} botlane makes nasus cry. RIP doggo.

Wouldn't {{champion:432}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:26}} {{champion:143}} basically any of these be more annoying for him than the Leona?
Probably, but leo was just the first one I thought of because of her CC lockdown and tankiness. Also vayne for obvious reasons.
While Leona can CC lock you Leona is also right next to you.  SMACK THAT HOE WITH YA PIMP CANE

Then Nasus be like
http://img1.ak.crunchyroll.com/i/spire3/4ab157a9e460700a75699a0852e2aaaf1436289624_full.gif
And then the enemy laner be trying to leave
http://pa1.narvii.com/6225/c6b07f17568c0f91b43b1b8437c2ca9fafe9837b_hq.gif
I know that series, I am ashamed to say...
Oh come on that anime was hilarious, no need to be ashamed (I know there's a manga or whatever too, but I can only speak for the anime).

> [{quoted}](name=Votable Jester,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4pzEtdv2,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2017-05-22T09:05:49.187+0000)
>
> Oh come on that anime was hilarious, no need to be ashamed (I know there's a manga or whatever too, but I can only speak for the anime).

It's hysterical, and apparently a season 2 is launching this year.
There's a reason they're called guilty pleasures.

lol I guess your guilty pleasure is just relatively innocent compared to mine...

I've said too much >_>

> [{quoted}](name=darkcastkiller,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4pzEtdv2,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-05-22T02:55:59.494+0000)
>
> I know that series, I am ashamed to say...

I still need to finish watching it.
Most opponents will then break the pact when their jg shows...
but what about when he decides he needs the super stacks from botlane?
TP in for those two larger minions.
when nasus vs nasus happens
Oh boy ... then both teams are screwed, because it's a permanent 4v4 until one of the Nasuses has enough stacks to one-shot the other and roam.

That's just the commandment of Nasus at work.

"In the event of a Nasus mirror match, a bro lane is the only acceptable result"
I did this once with sion V maokai.  ganks came and went, nothing happened, neither of us roamed.  most boring 25 minutes of my life.

> [{quoted}](name=TimX24968B,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=4pzEtdv2,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-05-22T04:49:55.398+0000)
>
> I did this once with sion V maokai.  ganks came and went, nothing happened, neither of us roamed.  most boring 25 minutes of my life.

Thats why you casually walk into botlane at lvl 6 after backing, ping a bunch, and ult for an easy double kill, then either take tower or tp back top/stroll through midlane.
As a Nasus main, this is 100% correct. Thanks for the good laughs

lmao, damn you! now i cant sit anymore!!!

im good at these bad jokes, someone praise me for it please
